Sorcer 1.0-SNAPSHOT API Documentation

Package sorcer.util

Interface Summary
CallbackModel The CallbackModel interface must be implemented by classes that do not use Model but want to callback.
Command Command interface must be implemented by classes that use commands and the CmdFactory pattern.
Invoker Invoker interface is used by CmdManager in the Command pattern.
Mandator This interface defines the remote method client can execute on the remote object via a Mandate argument.
Protocol The Protocol interface defines the basic operations for database connectivity.
ProtocolStream  
 

Class Summary
Artifact This is a tool to make referring to sorcer jars a bit easier.
ArtifactCoordinates  
CmdFactory An abstract factory for all GApp commands provided by a factory .
CmdManager CmdManager handles command execution, that might be delegated by default back to its invoker, or executed by application specific commands.
Crypt This is an implementation of the crypt() algorithm of DES encryption.
CSVStringTokenizer  
DataProtocolStream  
DataReader DataReader creates a lineBuffer (Vector) from a URL, file or string
Document Class that represents a document Object
DocumentDescriptor  
EmailCmd EmailCmd is a psedofactory for all email commands.
ExertProcessor  
GenericUtil SORCER generic utility class.
GenericUtil.RedirectInputStreamRunnable Class starts a thread that redirects and input stream to file
IOUtils  
JavaSystemProperties  
LibraryPathHelper  
Log Generic SORCER Logging Utility defines SORCER loggers for your providers.
Mandate  
ObjectCloner  
ObjectLogger  
PropertiesLoader  
ProviderAccessor A utility class that provides access to SORCER services and some infrastructure services.
ProviderLocator ProviderLoactor is a simple wrapper class over Jini's LookupDiscover.
ProviderLookup A class which supports a simple Jini multicast lookup.
ProviderNameUtil  
Result  
ServiceAccessor A service discovery and management utility allowing to access services by matching service templates and passing filters provided by clients.
ServletProtocolStream  
SMTPSession The SMTPSession class allows to send email messages using SmtpClient
Sorcer The Sorcer utility class provides the global environment configuration for the SORCER environment.
Stopwatch The Stopwatch class
StringUtils  
TimeUtil Format time into a readable string.
Zip  
 

Exception Summary
AccessorException
